html: Sharla and I are devastated to hear that Montana Highway Patrol Trooper Wade Palmer was shot in the line of duty this morning. Trooper Palmer and his family are in our thoughts and I join all the Montanans who are praying for his safe recovery.
text: Sharla and I are devastated to hear that Montana Highway Patrol Trooper Wade Palmer was shot in the line of duty this morning.  Trooper Palmer and his family are in our thoughts and I join all the Montanans who are praying for his safe recovery.

html: The Land and Water Conservation Fund has invested more than $500 million in Montana’s public lands over the last 50 years—at no cost to taxpayers. html: Any influence or supervision of taxpayer-funded personnel and programs by unelected, unaccountable and politically-motivated advisors is deeply concerning, especially amid such a tumultuous time at the @DeptVetAffairs.
text: Any influence or supervision of taxpayer-funded personnel and programs by unelected, unaccountable and politically-motivated advisors is deeply concerning, especially amid such a tumultuous time at the @DeptVetAffairs.

html: Early detection is everything when it comes to cancer. I’m glad my primary care doc suggested a colonoscopy when I had symptoms. If you’re 50+ w/ an average risk for developing colorectal cancer, talk to your doctor about which screening test is right for you. #MTNews #MTPol

html: This bill will NOT: ✘ Loosen restrictions on Wall Street. ✘ Make any structural changes to the @CFPB. ✘ Benefit large foreign banks. In fact, by providing #Relief4MainStreet, this bill ensures small, local lenders can continue to compete with Wall Street. #mtpolpic.twitter.com/x4jwXk4at4
text:
This bill will NOT:
✘ Loosen restrictions on Wall Street.
✘ Make any structural changes to the @CFPB.
✘ Benefit large foreign banks.
In fact, by providing #Relief4MainStreet, this bill ensures small, local lenders can continue to compete with Wall Street. #mtpolpic.twitter.com/x4jwXk4at4

html: This bill will provide much-needed regulatory relief for community banks & credit unions, establish stronger consumer protections & break through the Washington gridlock to achieve something rarely seen in Washington nowadays—results. #Relief4MainStreet #mtpolpic.twitter.com/2cqGNwOOlL
text: This bill will provide much-needed regulatory relief for community banks & credit unions, establish stronger consumer protections & break through the Washington gridlock to achieve something rarely seen in Washington nowadays—results. #Relief4MainStreet #mtpolpic.twitter.com/2cqGNwOOlL

html: Without #Relief4MainStreet, rural towns & cities will dry up, small businesses will lose access to capital, the dream of home ownership will be out of reach for millions of Americans & all we’ll have left are the same big banks that tanked our economy in the first place. #mtpolpic.twitter.com/gqOUeUbnIM

html: Prior to the financial crisis, there were 72 chartered banks in Montana. Today that number is 49. And Montana is not unique. Bank consolidation is leaving communities underserved across rural America. We need #Relief4MainStreet. #mtpolpic.twitter.com/2mXqCq2Ged

html: Holly Wiest grew up in Montana before moving to France to become a pastry chef. She moved back to Helena in 2014 and started @CottonTopPastry. Last week she opened her new shop to the public and sold out of everything within hours. Now that’s a Big Sky success story!pic.twitter.com/0wOMlfbja1
text: Holly Wiest grew up in Montana before moving to France to become a pastry chef. She moved back to Helena in 2014 and started @CottonTopPastry. html: Watch LIVE (http://sen.gov/Y9O1 ) as a I testify on behalf of my Blackfoot Clearwater Stewardship Act, a #MadeinMontana solution that: - Preserves our outdoors - Strengthens the local timber industry - Provides a blueprint for breaking the gridlock plaguing our forests #mtpolpic.twitter.com/a3YLJGEjdM
text:
Watch LIVE (http://sen.gov/Y9O1 ) as a I testify on behalf of my Blackfoot Clearwater Stewardship Act, a #MadeinMontana solution that:
- Preserves our outdoors
- Strengthens the local timber industry
- Provides a blueprint for breaking the gridlock plaguing our forests
#mtpolpic.twitter.com/a3YLJGEjdM

html: Community health centers across Montana—from Billings to Fairview to Kalispell to Dillon—are making their voices heard! Enough is enough. We must reauthorize funding for CHCs. More than 100,000 Montanans depend on it. #RedAlert4CHCs #mtpolpic.twitter.com/6nZxzf9woa
text: Community health centers across Montana—from Billings to Fairview to Kalispell to Dillon—are making their voices heard! Enough is enough. We must reauthorize funding for CHCs. More than 100,000 Montanans depend on it. #RedAlert4CHCs #mtpolpic.twitter.com/6nZxzf9woa

html: It’s been 130 days since funding expired for community health centers. Many are already scaling back services and if Congress doesn’t act now some might have to shut down completely. This is a #RedAlert4CHCs – we needed to reauthorize this funding yesterday. #mtpolpic.twitter.com/GON3morYik

html: The VA isn't living up to its responsibility to address the growing backlog of veterans waiting for doctor appointments. That's why I’ve introduced legislation to reform the system and hold the VA accountable to the veterans it serves. #mtpol https://sen.gov/N4XY pic.twitter.com/O0Z76ueIjE

html: I hosted a roundtable in Great Falls to hear from local leaders about what they’d like to see in an infrastructure bill. Folks on the ground know where investments in our roads & bridges are needed most, so let me know what you think at -> infrastructure@tester.senate.gov #mtpolpic.twitter.com/gaUQaZ23aA

html: In Montana, community health centers are at risk b/c for 130 days Congress has failed to renew their long-term funding. If Congress continues to kick the can down the road, rural communities will see their primary source of health care disappear. #mtpol https://sen.gov/K0RQ pic.twitter.com/v0gERHfRuY

html: I’m a big advocate for Veterans Treatment Courts, which provide an alternative to jail & connect veterans with counseling. We’ve already had success with them in Great Falls, Missoula & Billings and I’m very excited to add Bozeman to that list. #mtpolhttps://www.bozemandailychronicle.com/news/crime/we-owe-it-to-these-folks-bozeman-set-to-offer/article_d2ba4cfd-88d2-5d3c-a077-3fe74dd88102.html …
